name: Reasons
description:
Reasons is a game about getting up in the morning with heavy depression

you can complete tasks with mini games, but be warned these mini games are not easy, you can give yourself up to 3 Reasons to help you with your tasks so if it feels too hard remember this!

Controls are:

WASD for movement

F for interact

A & D for certain mini games

This was made for the 2020 Games Live Jam with the theme being "Carpe Diem / Seize the day"
